entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High 6.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 14 January 2023
